text: Mr. Gaitskell added that agreement with the unilateralists was not possible, though were recommending the supporters of unilateral nuclear disarmament to shift the emphasis of their intervention away from straight opposition to the official document on to opposition to the Polaris base.
handwritten_text: Mr. Gaitskell added that agreement with the unilateralists was not possible, though were recommending the supporters of unilateral nuclear disarmament to shift the emphasis of their intervention away from straight opposition to the official document on to opposition to the Polaris base.
